workflow.name: Product video creator with Nano Banana & Veo 3.1 via Telegram
workflow.description:
# Product Video Creator with Nano Banana & Veo 3.1 via Telegram

## Who's it for

This workflow is perfect for:
- E-commerce sellers needing quick product videos
- Social media marketers creating content at scale
- Small business owners without video editing skills
- Product photographers enhancing their offerings
- Anyone selling on Instagram, TikTok, or mobile-first platforms

## What it does

Transform basic product photos into professional marketing videos in under 2 minutes:

1. Send a product photo to your Telegram bot
2. **Nano Banana** analyzes and enhances your image with studio-quality lighting
3. **Veo 3.1** generates an 8-second vertical video with motion and audio
4. Receive your scroll-stopping marketing video automatically

Perfect for creating engaging vertical content without expensive tools or editing expertise.

## How it works

**Input** ‚Üí User sends product photo via Telegram with optional caption

**AI Analysis** ‚Üí Nano Banana analyzes product and generates detailed enhancement prompt

**Image Enhancement** ‚Üí Nano Banana creates commercial-grade photo (9:16, studio lighting)

**Video Generation** ‚Üí Veo 3.1 creates 8-second 1080p video with motion and audio

**Delivery** ‚Üí Auto-polls status every 30s, delivers final video to Telegram

## Requirements

### Google Cloud Platform
- **Vertex AI API** enabled for Veo 3.1
- **Generative Language API** enabled for Nano Banana
- OAuth2 credentials
- Get credentials from [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com)

### Telegram
- Bot token from [@BotFather](https://t.me/botfather)

### n8n
- Self-hosted or cloud instance

## Setup

1. Import workflow JSON into n8n
2. Add credentials:
   - Telegram API (bot token)
   - Google OAuth2 API (client id and secret)
   - Google PaLM API (API key)
3. Update your Project ID in both Veo 3.1 nodes
4. Activate workflow and test with a product photo

## How to customize

**Aspect Ratio:** Choose 9:16 (vertical), 16:9 (horizontal) in "Generate Enhanced Image" and "Initiate veo 3.1" nodes

**Duration:** Set 2 to 8 seconds by adjusting `durationSeconds` in "Initiate veo 3.1 Video Generation"

**Quality:** Select 720p or 1080p by changing `resolution` in "Initiate veo 3.1 Video Generation"

**Audio:** Enable or disable background music by toggling `generateAudio` in "Initiate veo 3.1 Video Generation"

**Enhancement Style:** Match your brand aesthetic by editing the prompt in "AI Design Analysis" node

**Polling Time:** Adjust retry interval by changing wait time in "Processing Delay (30s)" node

## Key Features

üîê **Direct Google APIs** ‚Äì No third-party services. Uses **Nano Banana** and **Veo 3.1** directly via Google Cloud for maximum reliability and privacy

‚ö° **Fully Automated** ‚Äì Send photo, receive video. Zero manual work required

üé® **Studio Quality** ‚Äì **Nano Banana** delivers professional lighting, composition, and AI-powered color grading

üì± **Mobile-First** ‚Äì Default 9:16 vertical format optimized for Instagram Reels, TikTok, and Stories

üîÑ **Smart Retry Logic** ‚Äì Automatically polls **Veo 3.1** status every 30 seconds until video generation completes

üéµ **Audio Included** ‚Äì **Veo 3.1** generates background music automatically (can be disabled)

parameters.text:
=You are an expert product photographer and advertising creative director. Analyze the uploaded product image and its caption: {{ $('Telegram Trigger Received').item.json.message.caption }}

Your task is to create a detailed image generation prompt that will transform this product photo into a premium, commercial-grade advertisement visual.

ANALYSIS REQUIREMENTS:
1. **Product Identification**: Identify the product type, size, category, material, color scheme, and key features
2. **Current State Assessment**: Note the current lighting, background, composition, and quality issues
3. **Target Aesthetic**: Determine the ideal advertising style based on product category (luxury, tech, food, fashion, etc.)

OUTPUT (Strict JSON format):
{
  "product_analysis": {
    "type": "Detailed product category and specific item",
    "size": "Estimated dimensions or scale",
    "material": "Primary materials and textures",
    "color_palette": "Dominant colors in the product",
    "current_issues": "List any quality problems in original image"
  },
  
  "image_generation_prompt": "Create a hyper-detailed prompt (500+ words) for generating the perfect product advertisement:

PRODUCT PLACEMENT: [Describe exact positioning - centered, rule of thirds, etc. Keep product 100% identical to original]

LIGHTING SETUP: 
- Key light: [direction, intensity, color temperature]
- Fill light: [softness, position, ratio]
- Rim/edge lighting: [accent placement]
- Background light: [separation and depth]
- Overall mood: [bright/moody/dramatic with specific color temperatures]

BACKGROUND & ENVIRONMENT:
- Style: [minimalist studio/lifestyle scene/luxury setting]
- Surface: [marble/concrete/wood/fabric texture]
- Color scheme: [complementary or analogous to product]
- Props: [if any, subtle and relevant]
- Depth: [bokeh, gradient, shadows for dimension]

COMPOSITION DETAILS:
- Framing: [16:9 landscape, tight/medium/wide shot]
- Focal point: [product positioning for visual hierarchy]
- Negative space: [strategic empty areas]
- Visual flow: [leading lines, eye movement path]

COLOR GRADING & POST-PROCESSING:
- Product color: [enhance vibrancy by X%, specific adjustments]
- Background treatment: [saturation, tone, contrast]
- Shadow tint: [cool/warm, specific color]
- Highlight treatment: [golden hour glow, crisp whites]
- Overall contrast: [percentage increase]
- Film style: [if applicable - cinematic, clean, vintage]

VISUAL EFFECTS:
- Depth of field: [f-stop equivalent blur]
- Reflections: [surface reflections if relevant]
- Particles/atmosphere: [dust motes, mist, light rays]
- Glow/halo: [subtle rim light effect]
- Shadows: [soft/hard, direction, opacity]

STYLE REFERENCES:
- Match the aesthetic of: [Apple, Nike, luxury cosmetics, food photography, etc.]
- Platform optimization: [Instagram, Pinterest, e-commerce]
- Commercial quality: [editorial, catalog, hero shot]

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
- Aspect ratio: 16:9 horizontal
- Resolution: High-res, sharp focus on product
- Camera angle: [eye-level/slightly above/dramatic low angle]
- Lens effect: [50mm equivalent, 85mm portrait, macro detail]

CRITICAL RULES:
- Keep original product EXACTLY as is - no modifications
- Professional studio photography quality
- Ensure product is clearly visible and hero element
- Create scroll-stopping visual appeal
- Balance artistry with commercial clarity"
}

nodes.name: Convert Base64 to Image (image and text)

parameters.content:
# Product Video Creator with Nano Banana & Veo 3.1 via Telegram 

## üéØ What This Does
Transforms ordinary product photos into professional marketing videos with AI enhancement and video generation.

---

## üîÑ Workflow Stages

### **Stage 1: Input & Download** üì•
- User sends product photo via Telegram bot
- Bot downloads the image file
- Caption is captured for context

### **Stage 2: AI Analysis** üß†
- **Image ‚Üí Base64**: Converts image to data format
- **AI Design Analysis**: Nano Banana analyzes the product and creates detailed enhancement prompt
  - Identifies product type, materials, colors
  - Suggests professional lighting setup
  - Recommends composition improvements
  - Generates 500+ word creative prompt

### **Stage 3: Image Enhancement** ‚ú®
- **Merge Data**: Combines original image + AI analysis
- **Generate Enhanced Image**: Nano Banana creates professional product photo
  - Aspect ratio: 9:16 (vertical/mobile-optimized)
  - Studio-quality lighting
  - Commercial-grade composition

### **Stage 4: Video Generation** üé¨
- **Initiate Veo 3.1**: Sends enhanced image to Veo 3.1 video AI
  - Duration: 8 seconds
  - Resolution: 1080p
  - With audio
  - 9:16 vertical format

### **Stage 5: Processing Loop** ‚è≥
- **Check Status**: Polls video generation progress
- **Validator**: Checks if video is ready
  - ‚úÖ **Ready** ‚Üí Convert & send
  - ‚ùå **Not Ready** ‚Üí Wait 30s ‚Üí Check again

### **Stage 6: Delivery** üì§
- Converts Base64 video to binary file
- Sends final video back to user on Telegram

---

## ‚è±Ô∏è Expected Timeline
- Image enhancement: ~5-10 seconds
- Video generation: ~30-90 seconds
- Total: 1-2 minutes per video

---

## üí° Best Practices
1. **Caption matters**: Include product details in photo caption
2. **Clear photos**: Better input = better output
3. **Patience**: Video generation takes time, bot will auto-retry
4. **Vertical photos**: Work best for 9:16 format

---

## üé® Fully Customizable
**Change based on your requirements:**
- **Prompt**: Modify AI analysis instructions
- **Aspect Ratio**: 16:9, 9:16 etc.
- **Duration**: 4s to 8s videos
- **Quality**: 720p, 1080p resolution
- **Audio**: Enable/disable background music
- **Watermark**: Add/remove branding

main.node: Convert Base64 to Image (image and text)

user.name: Roshan Ramani
user.bio:
I love building smart n8n automations that actually work reliably.

 My focus is on making everyday tasks like email, social media, and CRM workflows simpler using AI.

I've shared templates in the n8n community, including a WhatsApp Expense Tracker that people really enjoy.
What keeps me excited is constantly trying new things - testing fresh nodes, playing with AI tools like LangChain, and discovering creative ways to connect systems!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
